医学新闻来自News -Medical.net-世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-gb
基于AI的技术会加速发现新的结核病候选药物结核病是一种严重的全球健康威胁，在2022年感染了超过1000万人。通过空中和肺部传播，导致“结核病”的病原体会导致慢性咳嗽，胸痛，疲劳，发烧和体重减轻。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250207/ai-base-technology-accelerates-discovery-new-tuberculisosis-duberculisosis-drug-candidates.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250207/ai-base-technology-accelerates-discovery-new-tuberculisosis-duberculisosis-drug-candidates.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bd8f25-9f7d-4405-a2fb-541f3f3f25df5dd Fri, 07 Feb 2025 08:58:03 -0500 AI-based technology accelerates discovery of new tuberculosis drug candidates
具有自我修复特性的基于生物的“生活”材料可以彻底改变再生医学根据宾夕法尼亚州立大学的研究人员的说法，一种可以模仿生物组织中某些行为的生物材料可以推进再生医学，疾病建模，软机器人技术等。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250207/bio-basion-living-living-material-with-self-healing-properties-could-revolution-could-revolution-could-revolution--regenerative-regenerative-medicine.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250207/bio-basion-living-material-with-self-self-healing-properties-could-revolution-could-revolutionize-regenerative-regenerative-medicine.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=17B6A30E-70D7-4AB4-B956-56254E6F3B6E Fri, 07 Feb 2025 08:09:57 -0500 Bio-based "living" material with self-healing properties could revolutionize regenerative medicine
疟疾寄生虫的综合基因图提供了更好治疗的途径一张新的，全面的地图，是疟原虫（P. knowlesi）中所有引起人类疟疾的寄生虫的血液感染所必需的基因，是由哈佛TH Chan公共卫生和同事学校的研究人员产生的。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250207/comprehand-gene-gene-map-of-malaria-parasite-rasters-pathers-path-path-path-to-better-treatments.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250207/comprehand-gene-gene-map-of-malaria-parasite-rasters-finders-path-path-path-to-better-treatments.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=767A9B7-441A-4BC2-BEB8-1F55DAEE3C38 Fri, 07 Feb 2025 07:43:24 -0500 Comprehensive gene map of malaria parasite offers path to better treatments
轻度的电脑刺激无法改善中风幸存者的运动恢复根据今天在美国中风协会的2025年国际中风会议上介绍的后期科学，轻度的电脑刺激并不能进一步改善中风幸存者的运动恢复。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250207/mild-electrical-brain-stimulation-fails-to-improve-motor-recovery-in-stroke-survivors.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250207/mild-electrical-brain-stimulation-fails-fails-to-improve-motor-recovery-in-stroke-survivors.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=09b5b162-7b61-4ef9-8c58-c58-c19e2d313a25 Fri, 07 Feb 2025 07:21:42 -0500 Mild electrical brain stimulation fails to improve motor recovery in stroke survivors
逃生 - 莫沃试验进步对中风障碍的中风治疗的理解卡尔加里大学的Hotchkiss脑学院的研究人员在山麓医学中心通过卡尔加里中风计划进行了革命性的治疗方法，通过逃生试验彻底改变了中风的治疗方法，证明了一种被称为血管内血栓切除术（EVT）的血块检索程序可以极大地改善患者的急性渗透性渗透率，导致急性渗透性渗透率。大型血管中的阻塞。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250207/escape-mevo-trial-trial-advances-undercanding-s-stroke-warteatment-for-mized-mized-wevessel-blockakes.aspx.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/2025020207/escape-mevo-trial-trial-adial-advances-underding-s-stroke-warteatment-for-midium-midium sized-wevessel-blockages.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=518c3f18-ae25-430f-a465-39c18da914df Fri, 07 Feb 2025 07:17:13 -0500 ESCAPE-MeVO trial advances understanding of stroke treatment for medium-sized vessel blockages
盐替代物可能会降低中风复发和死亡风险研究表明，盐替代品会减少中风复发和死亡风险，从而提供安全的饮食干预措施，以改善中风患者的预后。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250207/salt-substitutes-may-lower-stroke-recurrence-recurrence-and-death-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250207/salt-substitutes-may-lower-sstroke-recurrence-recurrence-and-death-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8ff8015f-eed2-4398-BBF6-4CA14610039A Fri, 07 Feb 2025 07:13:00 -0500 Salt substitutes may lower stroke recurrence and death risk
在妊娠中期，低维生素D与更高的早产风险和胎儿长度降低有关根据最近的研究结果，孕产妇维生素D的状态对于胎儿生长至关重要，可能会降低早产的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250207/Low-vitamin-D-in-first-trimester-linked-to-higher-preterm-birth-risk-and-reduced-fetal-length.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250207/low-vitamin-d-in-first-trict-trick-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=86912610-e7a3-453b-a6d4-534932b0101f Fri, 07 Feb 2025 06:43:00 -0500 Low vitamin D in first trimester linked to higher preterm birth risk and reduced fetal length
